info.name: Youtube Material v0.1
info.description:
Inspired by Material Design and Youtube's Android app.

Features:
 -Material Design Icon Font
 -Material Design Search Bar with transitions
 -Material Design On-Screen Keyboard
 -Ripple
 and many more...
info.additionalInfo:
*31/03/2017: Ver 0.1

*05/04/2017: Ver 0.12 (Minor Update)

 *Dark theme will be available in the next updates
